Text: I've only seen the first episode, but I gave up because at the middle the video gets fuzzy and the sound just go off. Encoding isssues I guess. I'll try another torrent.
There's an issue with the order of the episodes. I had already seen the first 6 episodes, so I only downloaded 7-13 from this torrent, but the one named 1x07 is definitely 1x04.

Okay, watch the episodes in this torrent in this order: 1,2,3,7,4,5,6,8,9,10,etc.

1x07 is really episode 4.
1x04 is really 5, and so on.
That's only assuming 8-13 are labeled right.
